text: Macrococcus hajekii is a species of bacteria belonging to the genus Macrococcus. Strains of this species were originally isolated from the skin of llamas. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Macrococcus hajekii at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Staphylococcaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2003
title: Macrococcus hajekii
